DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess effectiveness dutasteride actual clinical practice prostate assessment clinic UK accordance best practice 12-month period .
DOC.brief_title: Observational AVODART ( Dutasteride ) Study In Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Subjects - OASIS
DOC.criteria: Patients receive pharmacological treatment surgical intervention BPH ( Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ) . Patients prescribed dutasteride compliance UK SmPC BAUS guideline treatment BPH . Patients must enter study decision prescribe dutasteride undertaken . Exclusion criterion : None specify
